name: PhysicsBodyMode
desc: The ways that a physics body can move in response to physical forces.

items.name: case dynamic
items.desc: Forces and collisions control body movement.

items.name: static func == (PhysicsBodyMode, PhysicsBodyMode) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two modes are equal.

items.name: static func != (PhysicsBodyMode, PhysicsBodyMode) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two modes are not equal.

items.name: func hash(into: inout Hasher)
items.desc: Hashes the essential components of the mode by feeding them into the given hash function.

items.name: var hashValue: Int
items.desc: The hashed value of the mode.
